website_summaries.verdict: Nice quality of jersey frame that provides a good level of UV protection for jerseys.
pros: Should fit smaller style jerseys nicely with interior dimensions of 30.5 by 22.5 inches
Reasonable price point for this type of case
Frame consists of solid wood with a clear acrylic door
Contains built-in lock and brackets on the back for hanging
cons: A tight fit for larger style jerseys, like football and hockey

customer_reviews.title: More than pleasantly suprised
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure how this would work out for my needs but I must say that I am surprisingly happy overall. I wanted a shadowbox to display my cap, gown, and hood following my graduation from graduate school. This box fit the bill perfectly (without me having to cut my garments). I have my graduation regalia, graduation program, and my diploma case all perfectly displayed in this box. Now I have a permanent manner to display my keepsakes and reminder of my special day. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dione

customer_reviews.title: Super Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! It came with very clear instructions for everything. Mounting the clothing, removing the protective film, installing the wall anchors, even the locks, every step in the process cameccx with instructions. The wall anchors are VERY nice and would support the case even if you filled it with concrete! This case is VERY nice and I am super pleased with how everything came out. TIP: Once you determine where and how high you want it, grab a graduated bubble level (one with measurements like a ruler) and a pencile to measure and mark the wall anchor locations. Then simply follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Jersey Frame
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent quality jersey frame. After pricing how much it would cost to get a NFL jersey hung at frame shops, I was appalled. They wanted $400 and that was a low estimate! No thank you. I decided to see how much it would cost to do it myself. I found a how to video online and decided to purchase this frame. It comes with a cardboard type insert for the jersey or a hanger for a basketball jersey. For me, the cardboard worked well. It also came with pins to keep the jersey in place. I thought it looked good once I got it framed and it made for an impressive gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Shingleton

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality - well built and super well packaged. It's ready to put the shirt in right out of the box with no assembly aside from deciding on mounting. Getting the shirt to set just right took a few tries, but no fault of the display case, just a bit of patience needed. Deep enough that I was able to put some cards and ticket stubs inside in front of the shirt in the case. Looks great !
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and dummy proof!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! I haven’t hung it yet but it’s simple enough to do, comes with the wall anchors and screws. There were plenty of pins for the Jersey, the included hanger and pin board was nice, The instructions were easy to follow. The protective film on the ‘glass’ was a nice added touch (I was it was going to be such a pain in the butt) it was very simple with a hairdryer. I’m a single mom and had no idea what I was doing, honestly I was terrified but this was so simple thanks to the instructions. Thank you for making it dummy proof! I wish I could add a photo!
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Display Cases
customer_reviews.text: Cases arrived fairly quickly and undamaged. Excellent quality and sturdy design. When you want to create some wall art and re-purpose your sports jerseys, this is an excellent option. Comes with everything you need to affix your jerseys in the display case along with options for placement. Also comes with all the hardware to hang them. We used football jerseys for our themed home theater. We love it so much that we have ordered a third one for an alternate wall! Excellent product and a Must Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honoring Black Mamba
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of expensive jersey frames out there, so I was skeptical after looking at the low price. I wanted to retire wearing my Kobe Bryant jersey and showcase it in a frame but didn't want to ball out. When this thing came in I was impressed. For the price, I cannot believe how incredibly well built and expensive looking the frame is. Easy instructions, safe shipping box. Can't ask for more. Also comes with keys if you want to lock the frame. I definitely want to purchase another one once I have the money so I can frame my #8 Kobe jersey and put them side to side. RIP Mamba.
customer_reviews.author: DLee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Case!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Shadow Display cases out there. I purchased 2 others to compare and chose which one I’m gonna stick with. This one by a mile blew the others away. Super easy to put together, quality is amazing, and the look that it gives is more than I expected. I put an XL football jersey and it fits and looks great. Don’t look for ones that are a bit less, you’ll be wasting your money. Spend a bit more on this product and you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jersey display case!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this jersey display case. It looks very nice on the wall, and is a good build quality. I used the included hanger for the jersey and it looks great, only took a few minutes to center up the jersey. I bought a few of these, and a few of the similar model with the locking door. I like this non-locking version better because it's slightly thinner than the locking version, the jersey just seems to sit better in this case than the locking version. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: ... match the 3rd case I bought because it is perfect for hanging a jersey and getting in and out ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the 4 display case I've purchased but I purchased this one specifically to match the 3rd case I bought because it is perfect for hanging a jersey and getting in and out of the case with the hinged door is wonderful. Previous cases did not have the door so I had to arrange the jersey from the back and it was not easy to make adjustments if it didn't look good. This is the best case and I like that it comes in various colors.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki D.

customer_reviews.title: Simply The Best
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with the quality and packaging of the shadow box jersey frame. Each one arrived in perfect condition individually packaged. 2 different ways to mount the jersey- use the included hanger or pin it to the display board. Also included are dry wall anchors and screws for easy wall mounting. I will buy again and you should too.
customer_reviews.author: Adamo

customer_reviews.title: Quality case that looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love this display case. This is the first autographed jersey I've ever had, and I wasn't sure what type of case to use. This one is functional, sturdy, and looks great. Everything comes with it... Foam board with plenty of pins, very solid hanging hardware, everything. I'm very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Braun

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with my signed Lev Bell jersey in it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with my signed Lev Bell jersey in it! Side note: got the jersey from pristine auction. Gave this 4/5 stars because it is very static-y. I suggest you use a lint roller to get anything off the black backing inside the case and use a soft cloth to clean the outer glass. Maybe I'm just super OCD about it being perfect. I would recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Nice, all you need in one package!
customer_reviews.text: A gift gift for a gift, but putting the jersey in it, I thought it was great! Everything needed to nicely mount a jersey. It was a Joe Greene jersey, size XL so I couldn't fold the sleeves like pictured, because part of the sleeve numbers would have been covered by the folded sleeves, but I made it work, and my sister loves it!
customer_reviews.author: AngelA

customer_reviews.title: VERY happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: VERY happy with this purchase, it wasn't difficult at all to position the jersey, came with all the things needed and took me 20 minutes from opening the box to hanging it on the wall. It has 3 places to hang it on the back too so it is very secure. It has 2 latches on the side to swing the plexiglass open and they look sharp. Plus the trim on the front comes a bit in from the size of the box so that helps hide any imperfections in your mounting job around the edges. Will definitely be back if I ever get another jersey signed!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Works great and has plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Used to mount a Sounders Zach Scott jersey. The soccer jersey is a bit long but folds over nicely after modifying the supplied backing. A slightly thicker backing plate would be nice making it easier to pin the jersey in place but no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Drone

customer_reviews.title: So HAPPY With This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase! Everything was protected. It comes with all you need to put the jersey in the case. You have 2 different options and there are instructions for both with pictures. Great company to work with and very nice quality product. My jersey looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L. Hester

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 for our locker room renovation. Outstanding quality. Packed well to ensure no damage. Great value for the money. They look like a million bucks. I would definitely buy again and recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: CoachB

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was a great product for the price. The wood is not the best quality, the glass is glued on the inside. After a few days it started to detach from the wood (maybe just a defective one?). Had to return but will consider getting a replacement since it was a good frame for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elvy

customer_reviews.title: Stop Scrolling. These are the Frames You're Looking For.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to frame my prized Wings signed jerseys, and they do not disappoint. Shipping, packaging, time, all superb. Note I am not the best at positioning jerseys in the frame, but take my word these are well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This case works great. Used my own anchors because I wasn’t so ...
customer_reviews.text: This case works great. Used my own anchors because I wasn’t so sure about the included hardware (goes for most items I buy). The door is a little flimsy but I expected it at this price point. Overall it’s a well built piece. Don’t plan on using the lock feature but it’s nice to have. Wish the back was more of a padded area to pin, but it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have bought some signed red sox jerseys that I wanted to be able to display in my room. These boxes were easy to work with when hanging the jersey and being able to have the option of hanging the jersey or pinning it was helpful. I will be buying from them again in the future when I need more jerseys hung.
customer_reviews.author: Randi D

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really pleased with this frame! I appreciate all the care that went into packaging to make sure nothing got damaged. Large, sturdy, stylish, and exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The display case itself was very nice, it would have been perfect for my needs. However, it arrived with a large crack in the glass. This may have been the fault of the shipper and not the supplier as the box seemed to be roughly handled with damage to the outside even though it was clearly labeled "Glass, fragile".
customer_reviews.author: A. Matthiesen

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey frame.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality with good instructions on how to best hang jersey. Came well protected. It has a protective sheet on the inside and outside of the glass. Using a hairdryer worked perfectly to remove it with no residue remaining on the glass. Jersey looks great in the frame.
customer_reviews.author: stellina757

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy...Anyone can do this.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. They look very expensive and literally anyone can do this. I ordered 2 and framed my son’s autographed jerseys to put up for Christmas. I highly recommend these. I’ll be ordering a few more to do the same thing for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Treadway

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a surprise to my son who had a great senior year playing football, his mom purchased his jersey from the school and I mounted it along with his awards and some memorable ticket stubs for him. It looks great! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great case! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This case was perfect to display our Emmitt Smith jersey. The box looked a little beat up, but the case was in perfect condition. I love how it came with the foam board, pins, and directions for pinning. We still need to hang it, but it did come with all the hardware needed to complete that task. When I saw the price listed, I was leery of the quality of the product, but now that I have it, I have no complaints. It is very sturdy and looks great. I will most likely order this case again once we get more jerseys.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, high quality, easy
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order from this seller, even though there was free shipping, because it wasn’t Prime 2-day. But it came the very next day! Even faster than prime. The product was great. Good quality. Well packed. Easy directions, with flexibility and hardware included for a number of different Jersey types. I had a signed baseball jersey for my son, and had it mounted and hung in minutes. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Best Jersey case on market
customer_reviews.text: These jersey cases are great. Our school retired some jerseys and we wanted something that many years down the road would last. These look great and are easy to use and install. Very clean and beautiful product. Delivered in two days with prime. I’ll order again for my own jersey later in life.
customer_reviews.author: Enaber

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I found that these displays are quite expensive. I found this one for a reasonable price and it had good reviews. I like that it comes with a hanger but you can only hang it portrait style, you can't hang it landscape style. Looks great and has latches but they feel like they will break if you keep opening and closing the case. I like that the glass is UV protective and the felt liner allows you to stick pins in to hold the jersey in place if you need to. Overall a great buy, I'm happy with the purchase, my autographed jersey looks great on display.
customer_reviews.author: BigPoppa80

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend and he LOVES it. He was so impressed with the quality of the frame and how sturdy it is. It came packaged very safely and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Got this item for a jersey I knew I was getting for Chrustmas. Item was packaged perfectly and even with plexiglass instead of real glass has a great professional look. Comes with a metal jersey hanger and also a mounting hard foam board so your chose to use one or the other (or both). Took about ten minutes for me to get jersey where I liked I.T. Have already ordered a second one for my other jersey! Unless you have hundreds of dollars to have custom cabinet frames made this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mailman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect frame for jersey!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's jersey and was pleasantly surprised at what a great frame this is for the price! It not only looks very nice, but it was super easy to hang the jersey and very quickly get it looking perfect. I love that the frame is hinged and can be locked.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Cade

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU NEED TO HANG YOUR SPORTS JERSEYS LOOK NO FURTHER , ORDER NOW !
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE COLLECTED MEMORABILIA FOR MANY YEARS, PAYING HUNDREDS OF DOLLARS TO FRAME JERSEYS !! JUST RECEIVED THIS FRAME AND LET ME SAY , ITS PERFECT ! EASY TO INSTALL, WILL BE ORDERING MORE !!
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: YAAAASSSSSSSSS
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to hang up my signed Kuzy jersey. It was stated that I could secure and lock the frame but my item did not come with keys but it doesn’t really affect the functionality🤷🏻‍♀️ With or without a key it’s still a great buy! I would recommend this item. LETS GO CAPS!🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: ireeh43

customer_reviews.title: Door does not fit tightly to frame...
customer_reviews.text: not a huge issue for me and my scenario. However, if I was displaying very valuable sports memorabilia I would want this display case to seal to keep environment outside...
customer_reviews.author: fargozombie

customer_reviews.title: Great frame at an even better price!!
customer_reviews.text: To say I was pleasantly surprise by this frame is an understatement. It’s not only gorgeous & well made, it was ridiculously easy to use and a great price point. I purchased 2 to start & have just purchased 2 more. You can’t go wrong with this frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent quality. It has a nice black felt backing
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent quality. It has a nice black felt backing, came with a hanger and board to fit inside the jersey. I'm not a Sports fan, but I won an autographed jersey in a contest. I am donating it to my church's silent auction to raise money for missions. This made it look fantastic. Very professional looking with gold hinges and closing clasps. Pray this auctions for a good amount!
customer_reviews.author: Jarod Dyess

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price or look. Buy this now.
customer_reviews.text: First time framing a jersey. Can't beat the price or look. Seems durable and easy to frame yourself. Took no longer than 15 minutes and has a nice fit. If you don't have 400 dollars to shell out for a frame this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S Moffat

customer_reviews.title: Great frame with instructions etc for hanging
customer_reviews.text: Great frame with instructions etc for hanging. Only issue was the large brown sticky paper that came stuck to the front and back of the glass. Not so easy to remove. Still removing residue. Otherwise great and excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: VanMaxLuna

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Had some help getting my son's football jersey in the frame. But the directions were good and clearly written. My sons jersey looks great hanging in the frame. I think he will love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. GarrettTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best Shadow box/display case for the money
customer_reviews.text: First off, these shadow boxes are great! It definitely beats taking them to a professional to have them charge you over $200 to place them in a display case. They are sturdy, seem reasonably built. I bought 4 of them to start off. Will be buying more in the future. This is a great product to show off your jersey memorabilia. Can’t wait to hang the rest of my collection up!
customer_reviews.author: Levi Stroik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect/ Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a quick & cheap way to get my jersey framed without spending hundreds at a Hobby Lobby or Michael's. This frame is perfect. Had the jersey done in less than 5 minutes. I didn't pin it or use tape. Fits right in and doesn't move.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loved that it had a lock on the side and that it came with the board to out in the jersey or a hanger it gave him options .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built, includes everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Well built/packaged frame for any size shirt. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with This Frame
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. A great way to display a jersey. Easy to use and good directions.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Received 2 signed football jerseys and saw these frames with reviews. Both frames came with no damage and all the instructions were easy to follow. Still working on it (have to steam some wrinkles) but just putting in case with foam backer they provide made it easy. Jerseys look great and saved money doing it while staying at home during this time.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three to put some jerseys in and I'll be getting some more. I was very pleased with the case with my only issue being my own lack of ability with getting the jerseys to lay out perfectly flat. Would be great to have some slightly bigger models where one could add pictures and such without covering up too much of the jersey.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny--looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality and came very well packaged and protected. Very surprised at how nice the frame was. If you have a jersey to hand and display buy this --its looks awesome and was so easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cerulli

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst product, not the best, either
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to display a jersey in my son’s room. The hanger is awkward and I felt like getting the jersey in was kind of a hassle. It looks good up on the wall after we finagled it in there. No horrible/not great!
customer_reviews.author: Qhycl

customer_reviews.title: Solid and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Comes with all you need to showcase your jerseys, it will last for decades
customer_reviews.author: Somewhere in the DMV

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying more for a quality frame
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a cheap option, then this will work. But don’t expect it to be perfect. Mine have gaps on the top and bottom. Won’t close all the way. Definitely won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Vansickle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful frames
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband's autographed football jerseys. They are beautiful frames, rich in color and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Di Marie

customer_reviews.title: Product as Described---Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I would buy again. Easy to set up and hang. Looks nice. Seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H.

customer_reviews.title: Best frame I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this, I’m able to show off my memorabilia perfect in the sports room and it’s very easy for a beginner to learn how to start framing jerseys. I have about 7 of these now with plenty more to get. If you want the best frame for your jersey and you’re just starting out this is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hockey jersey
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husbands hockey jersey. It was very well made and super easy to put the jersey into the display. I will buy another for next years jersey.
customer_reviews.author: Connie J

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and way cheaper than having it done at the frame shop. Everything you need comes with it. Only issue is that the door does not sit flush when closed but not a huge deal. Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Was easy to display jersey in. Simple to mount on the wall. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were easy to follow and my son absolutely loved his signed jersey in this beautiful display case. Very well made and has a lock and key so your little ones can’t get into it
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Martz

customer_reviews.title: Such an easy project! Comes with pins and a hanger and ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews and receiving quotes from Michaels and other local framers (both wanting over $300+) I figured I’d try this out. Such an easy project! Comes with pins and a hanger and two different instructions that explain everything perfectly! It took me roughly 15 mins from start to finish (opening packaging to putting together). Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Nikole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Soccer Jersey!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly, I saved $200+ by doing it myself instead of getting it framed professionally. I used the included foam board, traced the outline of the jersey, cut to fit, and pinned the sleeves to the board. I then used the metal hangar to hang the jersey in the frame. Took maybe 10 minutes total.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Afman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, get it!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value! It does come with pins, but not very many. I’m glad I got the Singer double sided fabric tape here on Amazon for under 5 bucks or else I would not have been able to get as good of results.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett T.

customer_reviews.title: Super and very good looking!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good looking and are perfect for jerseys of all kinds. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M Baker

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Legit quality, better than expected. Instructions came with, not super complicated to put together. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Richie Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very easy to use. I would buy again if the need arises. Definitely recommend over paying 500 bucks for the same service at a store.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Do you have?
customer_reviews.text: Do you have a frame that a 36 x 24 in flag would fit in? I ordered before from you and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Peterson

customer_reviews.title: No pins included
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape, but I was under the impression from the reviews and the picture that pins were included, and they are not. Please update your info to be clear on this. That was a determining factor in buying this particular frame, but now I have to go out and buy extra pins.
customer_reviews.author: Andy D

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Display case is very nice. Easy instructions and easy to hang. I've ordered 3 and will be ordering about 15 more. Very pleased with the product. Most important it was packed and shipped very well, unlike a case I ordered from another merchant.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Nice frame...a tad narrow you have to fold most of the arms over onto the uniform my only complaint.
customer_reviews.text: Nice frame...a tad narrow you have to fold most of the arms over onto the uniform my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Mike's Review

customer_reviews.title: the frame is nice and well made
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that I could pin my baseball jersey to the inside. There is no felt to pin the jersey down and had to use the hanger...not a fan of that look. However, the frame is nice and well made. I wold buy this again if I wanted the jersey to hang at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: The hanger inside of the frame makes adding in the jersey really easy! It looks great and people think I had it professionally done.
customer_reviews.author: soxfan1

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put my jersey in. Not as easy to hang. Looks good once it's finally up.
customer_reviews.author: tjvarnadoe

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure without any fuss
customer_reviews.text: Displaying my Fathers college sweater in this case was amazing. It is beautiful and secure. I appreciate how easy it was to complete. Thank you so much for making such a quality product, we will treasure this for many years!
customer_reviews.author: LaSondra Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Top caliber display case
customer_reviews.text: Absolute top-notch display case. Using it to proudly display a Tyreek Hill SB LIV Championship jersey, and it looks phenomenal. Great product, and I’m considering buying another one soon. And the owners of the company are extremely responsive people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he LOVES it. Great product! Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: LadyP

customer_reviews.title: Great display case!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent display case. Bought it to showcase my Bernie Parent autographed jersey. Includes hanger, pin board, and more than enough pins to neatly display any sized shirt. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Curran

customer_reviews.title: Protective Football Jersey Frame
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. I had a signed Baltimore Ravens jersey that I put in the case and it looks great and it got great reviews once I hung it in my gameroom. My suggestion is to not put a XX-Large jersey in it. It would be a very tight fit, but the X-large jersey fit in OK ( I have learned now to get just large signed jerseys to put in the case) and it is a fanstastic item and easy to hang. Great price and I will get more of them in the very near future. The item came in quickly and was well packaged not to break. Mike D.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Detillier

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for signed apparel that needs to be in a frame!
customer_reviews.text: These frames are the best you could ever ask for!! Ordered 3 of them due to the fact my husband surprised my sun with signed Brian Dawkins, Steve Carlton and Vince Papale jerseys!!! These came super quick and are very durable (HIGHLY RECOMMEND)
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Beecher

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: This jersey shadow box was far superior to any from Home Depot or Michels stores. And was 1/2 the price of either of those at the stores. Thanks because it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: Not very deep but fit the Jersey perfectly.... but it’s no shadow box which i think is what i should have gotten
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great frames
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 4 of these frames. (2 units each order). Looks great on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: When you realize how expensive it is to frame a jersey, you'll love this thing. It doesn't look cheap which I was a little afraid of; looks well built and like it costs double what it does. It comes with a hanger so you can hang your football/baseball/basketball/hockey jersey on it which is pretty easy to use. I've received a ton of comments on it. I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: recieved the product to display jerseys the lock is so cheap and doesent lock and when it does you can un do it with a hair pin or your finger the glass had scratches and the front was crooked and wouldnt close correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lemarr

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Easy assembly. Used for a signed baseball jersey. Looks great. Pins included. Easy to mount on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Frame for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This was excalty what I was lookong for. Michaels wanted hundreds of dollars to frame my jersey.
customer_reviews.author: SCBFSU

customer_reviews.title: They delivered it fast and it is very nice and streardy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame for my grandson to put his Detroit Tiger jersy in. They delivered it fast and it is very nice and streardy. Made well. He loves it. And I shopped many stores who carried this frame and my best buy was Amazon and it was better than others I saw and they cost a lot more. Order it you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Harju

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations for value, performance, quality of construction, utility, and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: The first one was sent back by the shipper as it must have been damaged. I reordered it. It looks wonderful in my man cave and a better price than going to a craft store.
customer_reviews.author: ColdWarVet75

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great display case! Great shipping! Very easy to pin jersey and it's nice they supply a board for the jersey! It's worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: So simple
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and get a nice professional look for your jerseys. Good size as well not too deep or wide so it doesn't look huge on your wall. For bigger jerseys you will have to use pins or fabric tape to get them to fit but very minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L

customer_reviews.title: Great value and look!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how nice these were for the price. Packaged very well and quality exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Good frame, takes a little work to mount jersey
customer_reviews.text: I like the frame. It is a bit tricky to mount a football jersey and get it just the way I wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Len R.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with the product or price.
customer_reviews.text: If you are on the fence about this item. DON'T BE - it is literally perfect for the price. I have purchased 5-6 of these and they look better than the professional ones. Might buy in bulk so they don't go back up in price. One day I will have a full man cave with 40-50 of these hanging up!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Get you some!
customer_reviews.text: These frames are simply awesome! I’ve ordered 5 so far & they Come packaged tightly & shipping is fast. Comes with everything to hang on the wall & to fit the jerseys!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great frame for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the black frame and it looks nice! I read a post about the hardware being flimsy so I was a little nervous about that but the hardware is fine. The front window does not sag when you open it, it stays solid. The glass is not anti-glare so that's the only downer.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Next best thing to having them professionally framed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased only these for my set of jersey. So easy to use and the best price I’ve found. Next best thing to having them professionally framed
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far with the purchase. Easy to insert and display my jersey.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Do-It-Yourself is always Better
customer_reviews.text: People charge so much to do it, so why not just grab the case and do it yourself? Very clean look, and very easy to hang. Comes with a hanger to keep the jersey in place while it's hanging, and there's plenty of room to include other pieces inside, like certificates of authenticity, booklets, cards, and other small items.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas DiMaggio

customer_reviews.title: but it was pretty hard NOT to
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky. I originally didn't want to pin my jersey...but it was pretty hard NOT to. It just wouldn't stay. And the hanger really didn't work for my Jersey because I wanted to show off the sleeves. (Baseball Jersey)
customer_reviews.author: Brittanyelliott

product_meta.title: Jersey Display Frame Case Large Frames Shadow Box Lockable with UV Protection for Baseball Basketball Football Soccer Hockey Sport Shirt
feature_bullets: Mahogany Finish. Made from solid wood. Jersey NOT included.
Great for most regular size sport jersey. Might have to fold backward to the back a little.
Hanger included. Brackets on the back for wall mountable
ULTRA CLEAR Acrylic Door Protection. Jersey Not included.
Dimensions:31.25" H X 23.25" W X 1.5"D Interior Dimension: 30.5"H X 22.5"W X 1"D
